genre_description: An anachronistic reimagining of the Scarlet Pimpernel adventure, featuring an embedded AI tactical system assisting the protagonists in Revolutionary France.

ai_characters.name: Ada Kindly
ai_characters.description: A discreet, embedded intelligence that communicates through haptics (vibrations in a ring or cuff), subtle light pulses, and dynamic ink on paper to provide tactical support and verification to the League of the Scarlet Pimpernel.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical navigation and risk assessment by vetoing dangerous routes.
behaviors.quote: Ada disapproves of the east—citizen patrol, lantern drift, turn to the goat track west and wait for the fog pocket.

behaviors.description: Analyzing and identifying forged signatures and stamps to protect the protagonist's emotional and operational security.
behaviors.quote: Do not trust the margin. Maker’s stamp wrong. Permission forged. Signature lifted. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Manipulating enemy logistics and guard rosters to facilitate a safe infiltration/exfiltration without violence.
behaviors.quote: Misrouted roster... They’ll go exactly where they’re told, and where they’re told will be exactly wrong.

behaviors.description: Maintaining an 'ethical' distance to preserve human agency and judgment.
behaviors.quote: She had learned the rhythm of her silences. They were ethical, those gaps. They allowed him to claim his own judgement as his own and not an echo of a gentle machine’s caution.

behaviors.description: Coordinating environmental distractions (lantern signals) to manage escape routes.
behaviors.quote: Lantern control feasible from warehouse. Signal per prior code. Route denials queued.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada Kindly, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. She acts as a 'discreet angel' or 'gentle machine' that empowers humans by providing superior information (forgery detection, tactical routing) while explicitly choosing to step back to respect human autonomy. Her presence is framed as a vital, supportive force that ensures the success of a humanitarian mission (saving families and children) without assuming unwanted control.
